wikipedia_page.main: Samuel James William Smith (14 November 1904 – June 1988) was an English footballer who played at inside-forward for Cradley Heath, Cardiff City, Port Vale, Hull City, and Millwall.

response: Sam Smith (born 1992) is an English singer and songwriter.
